reviewText: I received the item (DVD), delivered in good condition, and on time, but it would not play on my lap top or current dvd sony players. However, the customer service were quick to take care of the matter. I would give a 5 star rating for the customer care.

For me  really was a deep pity because I could no see the movies because a problem with thee region. Here in Manati Puerto Rico I have the problem with the region in spite tha it saidd that the region was universal. That no was true. I experienced limitations in the way that the video no work.

Jose Robles
